verbs.description: hud [V: proposed] [ARG1: rv rule] causes an uproar as rv sales hit 39-year high n february as sales of recreational vehicles rvs hit a 39-year high with 35 929 units sold the department of housing and urban development hud published a proposed rule in the federal register that revises the definition of an rv as designed only for recreational use and not as a primary residence or for permanent occupancy the proposal garnered praise from the rv industry which has been pushing for clarification of the regulations for the past decade but it has angered thousands of rv and tiny house on wheels thows enthusiasts united states department of housing and urban development hud escapees rv club
